name: Anon Hacker
description:
Anon Hacker is a comic style first person shooter with a twist. In Anon Hacker you will play a cyber warrior who uses code to defeat corrupt politicians and save whistle-blowers. On your journey to overthrow The Illuminati, you will collect crypto, destroy the banks and erase everyone's debts. You'll collect hacking style weapons and ammo to shoot code at debt zombies, lizard people, propaganda machines and more. Interact with NPCs to gather information and complete quests. Crack codes, select weapons and battle bosses to progress through the levels. A story driven adventure, Anon Hacker is set in a pop culture inspired world where you will meet all manor of different characters in meme like environments.



Features

- Switch to third person view
- Variety of weapons
- Large variety of enemies
- Interact with game objects
- Dialogue with characters
- Quest system
- Many levels to choose from
